00035 #ifndef INCL_BASIC_TIME
00036     #define INCL_BASIC_TIME
00037 
00039 #include "base/fscapi.h"
00040 #include "base/util/ArrayElement.h"
00041 #include "base/globalsdef.h"
00042 
00043 BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00044 
00045 class BasicTime : public ArrayElement {
00046 
00047     // ------------------------------------------------------- Private data
00048     private:
00049 
00050         int year;
00051         int month;      // 1 - 12
00052         int day;        // 1 - 31
00053         int weekday;    // 0 - 7  (Sunday is 0 or 7)
00054         int hour;       // 0 - 23
00055         int min;        // 0 - 59
00056         int sec;        // 0 - 59
00057 
00058         int tzHour;
00059         int tzMin;
00060 
00061     public:
00062 
00063     // ------------------------------------------------------- Constructors
00064     BasicTime();
00065 
00066     // ---------------------------------------------------------- Accessors
00067     int getYear() const { return year; }
00068     void setYear(int v) { year=v; }
00069 
00070     int getMonth() const { return month; }
00071     void setMonth(int v) { month=v; }
00072 
00073     int getDay() const { return day; }
00074     void setDay(int v) { day=v; }
00075 
00076     int getWeekday() const { return weekday; }
00077     void setWeekday(int v) { weekday=v; }
00078 
00079     int getHour() const { return hour; }
00080     void setHour(int v) { hour=v; }
00081 
00082     int getMin() const { return min; }
00083     void setMin(int v) { min=v; }
00084 
00085     int getSec() const { return sec; }
00086     void setSec(int v) { sec=v; }
00087 
00088     int getTzHour() const { return tzHour; }
00089     void setTzHour(int v) { tzHour=v; }
00090 
00091     int getTzMin() const { return tzMin; }
00092     void setTzMin(int v) { tzMin=v; }
00093 
00094     // ----------------------------------------------------- Public Methods
00095 
00096     int set(int yy, int mon, int dd, int wd,
00097             int hh, int mm, int ss, int tzh, int tzm);
00098 
00099     int parseRfc822(const char *date);
00100     char *formatRfc822() const ;
00101     bool isADate(const char* date);
00102     ArrayElement *clone();
00103 
00104     BasicTime& operator=(const BasicTime& d);
00105     bool operator==(const BasicTime& d) const;
00106     bool operator!=(const BasicTime& d) const { return !(*this == d); }
00107 
00108 
00109 };
00110 
00111 END_NAMESPACE
00112 
00114 #endif
